widget.name: Coiled Shadows
widget.description: A simple platformer game inspired from retro platformers. If everything goes well this will be a serie of 3 to 5 games. Each of them will have an opening scene and a boss fight. The game has a short playing time, it will probably take 1 or 2 hours to finish, I hope it will be an hour of fun. This is my first actual game with a graphical interface so it would help alot if you write a review on what botherd you while playing and what would you want to see on upcoming projects.
widget.author: Apache Cordova Team
